        Macden Communications Limited is into the production and distribution of beverages and is a major distributor for Nigerian Breweries Limited and International Breweries Plc.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Warehouse Manager

Job Location: Ogba, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

	Overseeing warehouse operations
	Managing staffs optimizing inventory and space

Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: patricia_asemota@yahoo.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note


	For Inquiries, please call 09063461304.
	The working hours and days are from Mondays to Saturdays and from 8am to 6pm and also on public holidays.
